nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.validation

Class ValidationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • nl.strohalm.cyclos.exceptions.ApplicationException
            • nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.validation.ValidationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContactAlreadyExistException, InvalidGroupTypeException

    public class ValidationException
extends ApplicationException
    Indicates data validation exception. it contains nested validation errors
    Author:
    luis
    See Also:
